variations.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 30% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 35% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 40% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 45% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 50% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 60% of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 30% of Celanya's ATK.
Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 70% of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 35% of Celanya's ATK.
Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 40% of Celanya's ATK.
Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 90% of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 45% of Celanya's ATK.
Attacks all enemies 5 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 100% of ATK. Within 10 seconds, when the allies deal Physical DMG, they inflict extra damage equal to 50% of Celanya's ATK.
With each attack, deals 1% more damage and ignores the enemies' Physical DEF equal to 1% of self ATK. Can stack up to 10% for both.
With each attack, deals 2% more damage and ignores the enemies' Physical DEF equal to 2% of self ATK. Can stack up to 20% for both.
